ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghosts of the Past, Conclusion; Deus Ex Machina Part 1: Prometheus picks up Betty and takes her to Pantheon headquarters where she has a heart to heart with her husband. The Hulk leaves to confront the Leader. Meanwhile, Rick has brought Marlo to the Leader who promises he can resurrect her.
A Titan Rides the Train!: The Leader ponders his origins as he prepares to send his powerful Humanoid to confront the Hulk. Although he is under suspicion for being in collusion with the Hulk, Banner is sent by train to escort one of his nuclear devices with Talbot keeping a close eye on him. The Humanoid attacks the train and Hulk fights the creature off. The nuclear device falls off the train in the skirmish and when Talbot goes to retrieve it he finds Banner next to it in nothing but a pair of ripped pants. Bruce is jailed as a traitor.
Deux Ex Machina, Part 2: Both the Hulk and Hydra attack the Leader's compound just as Soul Man is resurrecting Marlo from the dead. Despite Rick's protests, Hulk has a hand in interrupting the proceedings. Marlo is alive but her mind is gone.
